overview: The first concert DVD from rocker Lenny Kravitz. It includes live performances from his 2002 World Tour in support of his 2001 sixth album 'Lenny'. Footage filmed at Coors Amphitheater, Chula Vista & Molson Amphitheater, Toronto plus bonus footage. The DVD features material drawn from each of the artist's then six albums, from his 1989 debut 'Let Love Rule' through to 'Lenny'. Also featured is a rendition of his hit "Again," from his 2000 'Greatest Hits' set. Flimed & directed by Mark Seliger.
title: Lenny Kravitz - Lenny Live
